item.title: HPC for Bioinformatics (3/?): Head Nodes
item.description: HPC clusters can be daunting to beginners. This blog post explains the difference of compute and head nodes and goes into detail on head nodes.

item.title: HPC for Bioinformatics (2/?): Machine Installation
item.description: This post describes the two basic options for system installation that we have tried so far.

item.title: HPC for Bioinformatics (1/?): Introduction
item.description: This is the first entry in the HPC for Bioinformatics series.
